title: Rivian Roamer
text:
Privacy Policy for Rivian Roamer
 Effective Date: 2025/07/22
 Our Commitment to Your Privacy
 We do not sell, rent, or share your personal information with third parties. Period. Your privacy is fundamental to our service.
 What We Collect
 Your Info: Email, name, and linked Rivian account details
 Payment Status: Subscription status and billing email (we NEVER store credit cards - Stripe handles all payments)
 Usage Data: How you use our site, browser info, and device type
 Important: We NEVER store your Rivian password. We use secure tokens that must be reviewed every 6 months.
 Vehicle & Telematics Data
 We collect vehicle data through Rivian's API including location, battery status, and driving statistics
 This data is stored securely and never shared with third parties
 Location data is only used for the features you enable
 You can delete your vehicle data at any time through your account settings
 How We Use Your Data
 We use your information to:
 Provide and improve our service
 Send important updates
 Handle customer support
 Keep everything secure
 Your Rights
 You can:
 Access your personal data
 Correct any mistakes
 Delete your account and data
 Export your information
 Opt out of any communications
 Just email us at support@rivianroamer.com to exercise these rights.
 Security & Storage
 We use encryption for all data
 Analytics data kept for 1 year
 Personal data kept while you're a user or until you delete it
 We'll notify you if there's ever a data breach
 Third-Party Services We Use
 Stripe: Payment processing (they handle all credit card data securely)
 Analytics: Basic usage statistics (no personal data shared)
 Cloud Infrastructure: Secure data storage providers
 These services have their own privacy policies and security measures
 California Residents
 Under the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA), you have additional rights including:
 The right to know what personal information we collect
 The right to delete your personal information
 The right to opt-out of data sales (we don't sell your data anyway)
 The right to non-discrimination for exercising your privacy rights
 Other Important Stuff
 We use cookies to make the site work better and remember your preferences
 Not for kids under 13
 By using our service, you agree to this policy
 We'll update this policy on this page if things change
 Data may be processed in the United States
 Contact Us
 Questions? Email: support@rivianroamer.com
 Operated by Velocity Studios, LLC
 This action cannot be undone.
